name: Fishlastic
description:
You find yourself in the middle of an empty ocean in a boat full of trash. Look around in the boat. Pick up, drop and throw trash around and see if any fish appears in the ocean and explore a scene deprived of any living fish.

Fishlastic is a game inspired by Porky Hefer's artwork Plastocene made over the spend of 4 weeks.

Controls

The game can be played with controller and mouse & keyboard

Special Thanks

  • Callum Nottage (Callum Nottage)
